prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook is an ecosystem of multiple projects and tools, including Core Promptbook, Book language, Promptbook TypeScript project, Promptbook studio, and Hello World starter kits. It also has a community presence on various platforms like Discord, LinkedIn, and social media.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
